did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photocopies of memoranda and reports of the International Trade Secretariats.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of memoranda and reports of the International Trade Secretariats.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: International Trade Secretariats Miscellaneous Documents #5586m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Memoranda and reports; includes report on the negotiation between the World Federation of Trade Unions and the International Trade Secretaries concerning the Creation of Trade Departments by the World Federation of Trade Unions
